div.span:
Washington Colony School Closure Extension Message: Due to Novel Coronavirus COVID-19
School Site Closure until June 4, 2020. Therefore, WC School will continue to provide Distance Learning Educational Resources and Drive By “Grab and Go” Breakfast and Lunch meals to all.

a.title: Click to read more about: Update-School Closure Extension Message
